scenario_1.calculation_notes: Base 1040 fee of $175. Time charge calculated as (2.5 hrs × $125/hr × 1.15 complexity) - $175. First-time client complexity factor of 1.15 applied. Additional $50 for Schedule A and $35 for Schedule B.

scenario_2.calculation_notes: S-Corporation base fee of $650. Time charge calculated as (4 hrs × $125/hr × 1.25 amendment complexity) - $650. Three Schedule K-1s at $75 each, plus $85 for Form 4562. Prior year amendment complexity factor of 1.25 applied.

scenario_3.calculation_notes: Base 1040 fee of $175. Time charge calculated as (3 hrs × $125/hr × 1.20 multi-state complexity) - $175. Multiple state returns complexity factor of 1.20. Additional fees for Schedule C, Schedule SE, and Form 8829.

scenario_4.calculation_notes: Partnership base fee of $550. Time charge calculated as (5.5 hrs × $125/hr × 1.35 complex disposition complexity) - $550. Five Schedule K-1s at $75 each, plus $95 for Form 4797. Complex asset disposition complexity factor of 1.35 applied.

scenario_5.calculation_notes: Base 1040 fee of $175. Time charge calculated as (3.5 hrs × $125/hr × 1.30 foreign income complexity) - $175. Foreign income reporting complexity factor of 1.30. Additional fees for Schedule D and Schedule E with three rental properties.
